athi pujaniya wu uthum dalanda wahanse wadasitina aithihasika mahanuwara shri dalanda maligawedi pawathwanu labana aagamika wathawath wala dewani adiyara washayen pawathwanu labana yuddha hamuda dhajayanta seth pathima ada (28) sandyawedi aarambha wu athara me sadaha mawbime samaye arunalu udakirimata dayakathwaya labadun shri lanka yuddha hamudawe swechcha balasenawa, siyaluma aarakshaka sena mulasthana, senanka, bala senanka, puhunu madhyasthana, siyaluma rejimenthu saha eekakayan hi warnawath dhajayan ragena ema anshayan niyojanaya wana paridi yuddha hamuda niladharin saha sesu nilayin mahath abhimanayen ha gaurawayen yuthuwa shri dalanda maligawe pradhana doratuwa asala sita dalanda maligawe uthum dalanda wahanse wadasitina paththirippuwa parishraya wetha itha bhakthimathwa paminiyaha.
